name: Lee Marshall
nomination_text: Since joining the team, Lee has been celebrated in every Review and Retrospective as a positive, shaping member who adds a tremendous amount of value and asks difficult questions. At the same time, maintaining a creative, positive and productive atmosphere. Business Analysts and Developers now ask themselves, 'What would Lee ask here?'

name: James Thomas
nomination_text: I loved his work regarding a latency issue at Ada Health! Thanks so much

name: Patricio Miner
nomination_text: He has a great youtube channel with useful content in Spanish, lots of tutorials, demos and courses, helping many people to break into tech and grow, while having fun with their videos.

name: Craig Morten
nomination_text: Might be the biggest testing advocate at ASOS for quality, his work on accessibility has been amazing and eye opening. He is probably the best TDD Coach we have ever had and he has endless capacity to support and teach others.

name: Áine McGovern
nomination_text: Áine does incredible work supporting the testing community by supporting meetups and sharing tonnes of useful information. She's a cornerstone of the community ❤️

name: Veerle Verhagen
nomination_text: For starting a book club to (re)read Agile Testing Condensed, organizing live chats about the progress and sharing their learnings

name: Samuel Nitsche
nomination_text: For starting a book club to (re)read Agile Testing Condensed, organizing live chats about the progress and sharing their learnings
